summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 5, D. S. Maynard's Plat of the Town (now City) of Seattle, being the alley from Jackson Street to king Street; between Occidental Avenue and 1st Avenue South; by paving the same with brick laid upon a proper concrete foundation, all in accordance with Resolution No. 954 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
